com.github.shynixn.petblocks.bukkit.logic.business.listener

Class PetListener

  • com.github.shynixn.petblocks.bukkit.logic.business.listener.PetListener

  • public class PetListener

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PetListener(PetService petService, PersistencePetMetaService persistencePetMetaService, ConcurrencyService concurrencyService, EntityService entityService, ItemService itemService, PetDebugService debugService, ConfigurationService configurationService)
      Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChunkLoadEvent(org.bukkit.event.world.ChunkLoadEvent event)
      Avoids loading an invalid pet into a chunk.
      void onChunkUnloadEvent(org.bukkit.event.world.ChunkUnloadEvent event)
      Avoids saving the pet into the chunk data.
      void onEntityInteractEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityInteractEvent event)
      Cancels the entity interact event for pets.
      void onEntityLeashEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.PlayerLeashEntityEvent event)
      Gets called when an animal gets leashed and cancels it for all pet entities.
      void onEntityToggleSneakEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerToggleSneakEvent event)
      Gets called when a player presses the sneak button and removes the pet of the players head if present.
      void onPetBlocksLoginEvent(PetBlocksLoginEvent event)
      Gets called when the pet meta data would be prepared for a player.
      void onPlayerJoinEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent event)
      Gets called when a player joins the server. Join the pet if it was already enabled last time.
      void onPlayerQuitEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerQuitEvent event)
      Gets called when a player quits the server. Clear pet resources and fix enable state in persistence.
      void onPlayerRespawnEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerRespawnEvent event)
      Handles pet despawning and respawning on player respawn.
      void onPlayerTeleportEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerTeleportEvent event)
      Handles pet despawning and respawning on player teleport.
